storyInfo: Cutter is obsessed with learning how to cook. It seems to have something to do with a knot in her heart.

attributes.content: Some people say mercenaries are like MREs. Meals, ready-to-eat.
Can be eaten right out of the bag. Disposable. High efficiency, low risk. The best kind of field ration.
But if given a choice, practically everyone would choose to eat fresh, hot food. And practically no one would choose to risk their lives just to earn their next meal.
If given a choice.
All units take note, the target has entered the alert range, and is expected to reach the defense point in one minute.
All units are to complete emergency preparations within thirty seconds. Repeat, all units are to complete emergency preparations within thirty seconds.
Over.
Um, I'm here to see if you need any help?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Oh, there you are, Cutter.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You're just in time to try my veggie flatbread, fresh from the oven!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Thanks, I think I will.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Mm... It's really good.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Haha, I don't call it my specialty for nothing.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Why not take a few more for the road? Don't be shy now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Uhh, I appreciate it, but I'm good. I'm just here to see if there's anything I can help you with.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Ehh? I'm pretty much done cooking on my end. Maybe you can go check on Matterhorn though!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oh, Cutter! Perfect timing. Here, try my Kjerag-style braised meat.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I substituted scalesaur meat because it's easier to get, and changed the seasonings accordingly. But I was just thinking I needed a taste-tester.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Mm, sure. I'll try some.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Chews)
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Very good. I can't say much else about it... but it's very tasty.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Nothing to write home about then? Hmm... Looks like I'll have to work on the flavor to make it more distinctive.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: No, that's not what I meant. I'm just not very good at... describing things. Believe me, Matterhorn, your cooking is top notch!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: By the way, could you use any help?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Haha, I'm all squared away over here. All the dishes are already cooking, so all that's left is to turn off the heat later. Gummy might need help though, in a bit.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Actually, wait. There is something. I experimented with a few more new dishes today, and I'd like your opinion on all of them, if it's not too much trouble.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Cutter! Come try some of Gummy's fried pies!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'm kind of full...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: But do you need help with anything, Gummy?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I've already finished frying up my pies~
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Then, I suppose I can try one.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Is it good?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I... think so?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Urgh... Can't take another bite...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I just wanted to lend a hand, but ended up getting treated to an early lunch and then some.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Well, at least everyone's been real good to me.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I'm here to help!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Oh, Sideroca, right on time. Two of our logistics operators took the day off, so the three of us are a bit short-staffed right now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: We might be able to manage if we all went full throttle, but I'd rather not burn ourselves out for no reason.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: My arm's all sore...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Well, your savior has arrived! Good work hanging on so long.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Oh, and I happened to see Cutter in the cafeteria just now. Had a real mopey look on her face. Any idea what's wrong with her?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Right, you don't come by the kitchen a lot, so you might not know...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: One month ago...
Good work everyone. Um... but is there anything I can help with?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Ohh, you must be Cutter, the new arrival. Perfect timing—could you chop up those potatoes into chunks, if you don't mind? We'll be making soup soon.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Mm, got it.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Cutter! I asked you to chop the potatoes, not the cutting board!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: It was an accident! I'll pay for it—
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: No, it's fine, don't worry about it. I guess you're not very experienced with a kitchen knife? Just keep an eye on the pot then. Remember to stir it around with a ladle every now and then, so it doesn't burn.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Understood. I won't mess up this time!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Stir, stir... Don't let it burn, stir...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Stir, stir...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Sniffs) What's that smell?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: As much as it pains me to do this to her, as one of Rhodes Island's kitchen staff, I absolutely can't have a repeat of last time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The lady in the logistics department even thought about adding a 'Cutter is not allowed in here' sign next to the 'Kay is not allowed' one...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'd rather avoid unnecessary food waste, if possible.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh, I see...
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: But I won't stand for it!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Cutter! Get back here!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Huh? Sideroca?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You're not allowed to throw in the towel, ever!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's for the best. I just mess things up for everyone else anyway.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Don't worry about that. We've got plenty of time until dinner, so who cares if you make a few mistakes on the way?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Are you sure? I really appreciate it.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Don't mention it. I just think that if you want to do something, you should see it through to the end.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: So starting from today, I'm going to give you a crash course in cooking!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Relax. With me here, there won't be a repeat of last time.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I'll do my best, Sideroca!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I'm your instructor now, so let me hear a 'yes, ma'am!'
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Haha, so this is what it feels like to be an instructor.)
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Ahem... Pop quiz! What do you think cooking is?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Making food fit to eat?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Wrong! You couldn't be more wrong!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's not as simple as making something edible. Remember this: cooking is the art of bringing out the characteristics of each ingredient to make something delicious!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I, I'll keep that in mind!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: From the looks of it, you don't even know the fundamentals. In which case, I'll have to start from the basics. Stand at attention and follow my orders!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: The first, most basic thing you need for any dish is knife work.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Listen up! First, raise your knife!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Um, with my left or right hand...?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Well, with your dominant hand. Then hold the potato with your other hand, and run the knife along the contours and gently peel off its skin, like this...
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Follow the contours... Gently... Oh, it flew across the room.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: How in the—
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: How can someone named 'Cutter' be this bad with a blade?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Cutting vegetables feels completely different from cutting my enemies.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I mean, I get you, but... the ingredients are not your enemies.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: In any case, practice makes perfect, same as any skill. So let's keep practicing!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You're amazing, ma'am. I never knew mashed potatoes could taste so good.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Haha, we can't let perfectly good food go to waste, after all...
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: (After seeing so many potatoes gutted like that, I couldn't think of any other way to use them.)
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: See, cooking isn't so difficult. Once you've gotten the feel of handling a kitchen knife, you'll be peeling potatoes, no problem.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: But then I almost burned a hole through the pot while waiting for it to heat up...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You're still too tense, Cutter. Cooking isn't like swordsmanship. You can't expect to get it down just by mechanically imitating a teacher, like finishing an assignment.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's about understanding your ingredients, and turning them into what you hope for.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Right! The most important thing is hope!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: That makes perfect sense! Mm, I'll remember that.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: By the way, why do you want to cook so much?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: You should already be able to find any kind of cuisine you like in the Rhodes Island cafeteria, right?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's because... I've never had anything but MREs. So I want to know what it's like to eat something I made with my own hands.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Well, maybe not 'never,' but I was following my master for as long as I can remember, and my master didn't know how to cook either.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Later on, after I became a mercenary, I had even fewer opportunities to sit down and enjoy a peaceful meal.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I was really curious about how food was made, so one time I slipped into a tavern's kitchen to go take a look. The owner thought I was a thief though, and ended up scolding me all night. Ahaha...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Cutter!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Hwah! Yes, ma'am?!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I swear, I'll teach you how to cook if it's the last thing I do!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Even if we have to sacrifice a dozen potatoes, no, a hundred, I swear I'll teach you!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Um, please calm down. That's all in the past now. And look, I survived and stayed healthy—
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Finish up your mashed potatoes, and we'll continue the training!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I can't believe I ended up using the rest of the potatoes and she had to go look for more ingredients...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Getting kind of... sleepy...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: No, no, I can't let her down now!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I just learned how to peel potatoes, so I can't afford to slack off already!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: *Yawn*... But the afternoon sun is so comfy...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I can't keep my eyes open...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Maybe a little nap...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Hey, wake up.
Here, this is yours.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Lucky you, you can fall asleep even at a time like this. But that's fine. There's still time before we head out, so conserve your strength while you can.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Hey, you over there. Catch.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Again with the canned food?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: We're lucky we even have canned food. You got any idea what happens to mercs who lose their supplies out in the barrens?
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: You collapse on the ground out here, and scavenging Originium slugs think you're a carcass and start gnawing on your clothes from your legs up. You're still conscious by the time they get to your flesh.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I'm sure in the mood for some coal-grilled sandworm legs. Preferably fresh.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: *Columbian profanity* You wish.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Why can't we grill something anyway? I'd even settle for soup at this point.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: We're in the barrens, and there's no wind. Fire means smoke, which means anybody can spot us from miles away.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Might as well be broadcasting 'there's a caravan here' to all the other mercenaries in the area.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: We're escorting goods this time, so we can't afford to blow our position.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Ooh, the little girl's talking like a pro now. How many runs have you made at your age?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Too many to count.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Done pretty much everything except fraud and trafficking. I've probably been doing this longer than you, too.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You talk a big game. But how do you know when I got in the biz?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Your knife.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: It's one of the latest from Raythean, put out just last year. Brand new materials, and half the weight of the previous generation. No signs of wear and tear on your belt sheath either, so you can't have used other knives before.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Impressive. You sure know your stuff.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, I'm only doing this because I lost my farm in a Catastrophe. Who the heck would take a job that puts a bounty on their head if they had any land to grow crops on?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Heh. Still, I might be the newbie here, but I've never screwed up a job.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: If we bump into any bandits, I'll show you what I'm capable of.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Bah. Don't jinx us.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: Can't you take a joke? We did a great job covering up our trail, and we only got our route just before setting off.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: That's the best way to keep it secret.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Some employers prepare multiple route maps in advance and keep them sealed. Before departure, a middleman will randomly select one and hand it to the mercenaries.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Then we're allowed to refuse the job if the seal has been tampered with.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: This avoids direct contact between the mercenaries and the employers, and also eliminates the risk of leaks. Our client kept things professional this time.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: What a stand-up guy. Makes you wonder what the hell is in these boxes to be worth all this trouble.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: We just drop off the goods at the destination, grab our money, and leave. Nothing else matters.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: True. But when they're paying this much just to move 'em, they must be worth a pretty penny! Makes me feel like I'm in the big leagues now, hahaha!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Soon as I get my hands on that cash, I'm gonna find a good bar and drink myself silly.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: A few more contracts like this, maybe I'll even head south, buy another plot of land, and open another brewery! Hahaha!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: What about you guys? What are you gonna do with the money?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Can't say I share your optimism, so I'll need to find a weaponsmith for crossbow maintenance first.
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: How about you, girlie?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: A new hairclip, probably.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Huh? What'd you say?
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: I lost my last one. My bangs sometimes fall down and block my vision, and it's a pain in the ass.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Ahahahahaha—
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Bwahahaha...
attributes.name: Mercenary A

attributes.content: What's so funny?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.text: The value and purpose of the food is never for it to decide.
And after the usable portions have been squeezed out, what remains is just excess waste.
Waste, to be tossed away in the barrens without a second thought.

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: We're the only ones still alive...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: That attack was clearly premeditated.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I can't say for sure what happened, but someone must have deliberately exposed our position—
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: What are you doing? Forget about the goods. We're already exposed, and there'll be more after us before long!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: We've already failed the mission! You need to head to the town up ahead and find a way to deal with your injuries—
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Do you not see this chunk of Originium in my neck?! It's over for me!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: I'm already dead! I just want to take a goddamn look at the shit I'm dying over!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: There's no need for you to—
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Hah... Haha... Hahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Empty. There's nothing inside!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: We've been nothing more than goddamn bait from the very beginning! That money... was the price of our heads!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: I'm such an idiot. How could I get caught up in other people's bullshit? As if being a mercenary can just endlessly shit out money.
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Hahaha... But I suppose they're right about one thing. Die fast enough, and you won't have any need for money!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Damn it all! All you mercs can go to hell!
attributes.name: Mercenary B

attributes.content: Hey, Cutter? Wake up.
Ah! Sorry, how long was I asleep?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Your training's been getting rough recently.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Still, it's been a month, and it's time to check on your progress. So chin up and show me what you've got!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: You ready?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Mm... Mhm!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Swallows nervously)
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Carefully lifts the lid of the pot)
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I've finally... finished.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Woooah, this looks pretty promising!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I knew you could do it, Cutter!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's all thanks to you, Sideroca. I'd never have managed it alone.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Who cares about that? Let me have a taste!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: W-Wait!
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Maybe I should try it myself first...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: (Chews)
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: How is it?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It seems...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Seems what?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Not very good.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Hm? Let me try.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: What are you talking about? It's great. You're too hard on yourself. I'd even believe it if you told me Matterhorn made it.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: You're exaggerating...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: No, I'm not. How do I put this? This is definitely your own style of cooking!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I was dumbstruck when you said you'd make canned sandworm risotto at the end of our 'class,' but I never expected it to be this delicious!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: The heavy seasoning from the canned worms was mellowed out by the rice, and the meat tasted much better after being re-cooked.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Damn, the mashed potatoes on the side cap things off perfectly too! I think this dish might even be worth a spot on the cafeteria menu!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I remembered what you said about 'understanding the ingredients, and turning them into what I hope for.' I kept thinking it over, and the only food I really understand is canned sandworms.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: That just proves you've mastered the art of cooking!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: But I only know how to make one dish.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Sure, for now, but it's an entirely new beginning for you!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Mm, I'll keep that in mind.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: It's much more than trying to finish an assignment. It's about having hope... and creating something I want.
attributes.name: Cutter
